items.name: auth
items.title: Auth
items.description: Displays the user login status and allows them sign in using different social identities.

items.name: counter
items.description: Encapsulates interaction with the Echo Count API and provides a simple live updating number.

items.name: facepile
items.description: Displays users (actors) returned in any activity stream and displays a live updating collection of avatars and names.

items.name: stream
items.description: Encapsulates interaction with the Echo Search API and displays live updating search results in a standard 'news feed' style format.

items.name: submit
items.description: Encapsulates interaction with the Echo Submit API and provides a simple 'submit/comment form' style interaction.

items.name: reply-plugin
items.title: Reply
items.description: The plugin adds extra “Reply” button to each item in the Stream control. Integrates Submit control and provides the ability to reply to the posted items.

items.name: like-plugin
items.title: Like
items.description: The plugin adds extra Like/Unlike controls to each item in the Stream control for authenticated users.

items.name: community-flag-plugin
items.title: CommunityFlag
items.description: The plugin adds extra Flag/Unflag buttons to each item in the Echo Stream control for authenticated users.

items.name: text-counter-plugin
items.title: TextCounter
items.description: The plugin adds the character counter under the text field in the Submit control. Allows to set the maximum length of the text to enter.

items.name: comments-sample
items.title: Comments sample
items.description: Example of a simple app built using the "How to develop an app" guide.
